entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
